ArabicNames
===========

.. image:: https://i.ibb.co/0tPP7Dq/Screenshot-from-2021-07-03-05-30-06.png
   :target: https://github.com/AhmedMadbouly/ArabicNames
   :align: center
   :width: 200px

Random arabic name generator


Installation
------------

The script is `available on PyPI`_.  To install with pip::

    pip install ArabicNames


Usage
-----

Names can be used as a command line utility or imported as a Python package.


Python Package Usage
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Here are examples of all current features:

.. code-block:: pycon

    >>> import ArabicNames
    >>> names.get_full_name()
    u'Muhtadi El-Alaoui'
